thread.title: Kurdistan Oil Payment Raises Hopes for Western Energy Companies
thread.title_full: Kurdistan Oil Payment Raises Hopes for Western Energy Companies - WSJ

author: Selina Williams
title: Kurdistan Oil Payment Raises Hopes for Western Energy Companies
text:
LONDON—The Kurdistan Regional Government has made its second payment this year to Gulf Keystone Petroleum Ltd., the company said Thursday, raising hopes for western energy businesses operating in Iraq’s northern region.
The $12 million payment to Gulf Keystone comes amid greater optimism about the semiautonomous Kurdish government’s ability to pay oil companies, which say they are owed over $1 billion for crude exports from the...
